intro.description: Explore unhelpful patterns, understand where limiting beliefs originated, and practice self-compassion to create space for change and growth.

subsections.title: Unhelpful Stories
subsections.prompt: What stories do you tell yourself that leave you feeling worthless or unlovable?

subsections.title: Story Origins
subsections.prompt: Where did these beliefs originate? Connect each story to its source.
subsections.originPlaceholder: Where did this belief come from? Family, experiences, culture...

sections.title: Compassion
sections.description: Treat yourself with the same care and kindness that you would a good friend. Remind yourself: these patterns were adaptation. What other options do you have? If your self-hatred tells you to shut down, isolate, or punish yourself, what would it look like to do the opposite? To reach out, to rest, or to speak kindly to yourself?
sections.placeholder: How can you respond to yourself with compassion? What would kindness look like? What opposite actions could you take when self-criticism arises?
